name: NORTH CAROLINA ASSOCIATION OF REGIONAL COUNCILS OF GOVERNMENT
description: North Carolina Association of Regional Councils of Governments - local government
sampleDescriptions: Advocating for, and improvements to, reauthorizations of the Workforce Innovation and Opportunity Act and the Older Americans Act.
